pr_title: PLANNER-1802 Add early termination test for SolverManager

timeline.message: PLANNER-1802 Add early termination test for SolverManager
PLANNER-1802 Add additional comments and add one more loop

timeline.bodyText: Just a nitpicking: the condition can be put in the while clause to avoid break in the middle of the loop
timeline.author: rsynek

timeline.bodyText: If this test fails (as it reproduces an issue), let's mark it as ignored with a link to that issue and get this merged. Once the issue is fixed, it will be enabled.
timeline.author: rsynek

replies.bodyText: This timeout approach is not race condition free. If we activate this test, it will cause randomly failing unit tests (which is never acceptable). I am going to refactor this to use Latches.
replies.author: ge0ffrey

timeline.message: PLANNER-1802 Add Jira link to @Ignore text

timeline.author: ge0ffrey
ge0ffrey

replies.author: ge0ffrey

replies.bodyText: How long does calling a REST method take? That polling should not be able to DDOS a slow rest service.
replies.author: ge0ffrey

replies.bodyText: @rsynek These comments didn't make it in (nor have a comment to reject them), I 'll provide a Pr for it together with the issue itself.
replies.author: ge0ffrey
